protein.specific_function: Catalyzes the 6-electron oxidation of protoporphyrinogen-IX to form protoporphyrin-IX.

go_class.description: oxidoreductase activity, acting on the ch-ch group of donors
oxidoreductase activity, acting on the ch-ch group of donors, oxygen as acceptor

reference.reference_text: Nishimura K, Taketani S, Inokuchi H: Cloning of a human cDNA for protoporphyrinogen oxidase by complementation in vivo of a hemG mutant of Escherichia coli. J Biol Chem. 1995 Apr 7;270(14):8076-80.
